ACH_CAMEL_DANCERS.name: Camel Cavalry
ACH_CAMEL_DANCERS.description: Spray the dancers using Humphrey Ciabatta.

ACH_BIG_IN_JAPAN.description: Beat the whiplash course without getting wet

ACH_DEMOGOAT.description: Have 10 gas cannisters explode at the same time

ACH_JOHNNY.name: Here's Johnny!
